resource-agent.name: udp
resource-agent.longdesc: This plugin tests UDP connections with the specified host (or unix socket).
resource-agent.shortdesc: This plugin tests UDP connections with the specified host (or unix socket).

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.longdesc: Host name, IP Address, or unix socket (must be an absolute path)
parameter.shortdesc: Host name, IP Address, or unix socket (must be an absolute path)

parameter.name: port
parameter.longdesc: Port number (default: none)
parameter.shortdesc: Port number (default: none)

parameter.name: use-ipv4
parameter.longdesc: Use IPv4 connection
parameter.shortdesc: Use IPv4 connection

parameter.name: use-ipv6
parameter.longdesc: Use IPv6 connection
parameter.shortdesc: Use IPv6 connection

parameter.name: escape
parameter.longdesc: Can use \n, \r, \t or \ in send or quit string. Must come before send or quit option Default: nothing added to send, \r\n added to end of quit
parameter.shortdesc: Can use \n, \r, \t or \ in send or quit string. Must come before send or quit option

parameter.name: send
parameter.longdesc: String to send to the server
parameter.shortdesc: String to send to the server

parameter.name: expect
parameter.longdesc: String to expect in server response (may be repeated)
parameter.shortdesc: String to expect in server response (may be repeated)

parameter.name: all
parameter.longdesc: All expect strings need to occur in server response. Default is any
parameter.shortdesc: All expect strings need to occur in server response. Default is any

parameter.name: quit
parameter.longdesc: String to send server to initiate a clean close of the connection
parameter.shortdesc: String to send server to initiate a clean close of the connection

parameter.name: refuse
parameter.longdesc: Accept TCP refusals with states ok, warn, crit (default: crit)
parameter.shortdesc: Accept TCP refusals with states ok, warn, crit (default: crit)

parameter.name: mismatch
parameter.longdesc: Accept expected string mismatches with states ok, warn, crit (default: warn)
parameter.shortdesc: Accept expected string mismatches with states ok, warn, crit (default: warn)

parameter.name: jail
parameter.longdesc: Hide output from TCP socket
parameter.shortdesc: Hide output from TCP socket

parameter.name: maxbytes
parameter.longdesc: Close connection once more than this number of bytes are received
parameter.shortdesc: Close connection once more than this number of bytes are received

parameter.name: delay
parameter.longdesc: Seconds to wait between sending string and polling for response
parameter.shortdesc: Seconds to wait between sending string and polling for response

parameter.name: certificate
parameter.longdesc: Minimum number of days a certificate has to be valid. 1st is #days for warning, 2nd is critical (if not specified - 0).
parameter.shortdesc: Minimum number of days a certificate has to be valid.

parameter.name: ssl
parameter.longdesc: Use SSL for the connection.
parameter.shortdesc: Use SSL for the connection.

parameter.name: warning
parameter.longdesc: Response time to result in warning status (seconds)
parameter.shortdesc: Response time to result in warning status (seconds)

parameter.name: critical
parameter.longdesc: Response time to result in critical status (seconds)
parameter.shortdesc: Response time to result in critical status (seconds)

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.longdesc: Seconds before connection times out (default: 10)
parameter.shortdesc: Seconds before connection times out (default: 10)

parameter.name: extra-opts
parameter.longdesc: Read options from an ini file. See http://nagiosplugins.org/extra-opts for usage and examples.
parameter.shortdesc: ini file with extra options
